jobActivity.title: about sending Consent for the CV
jobActivity.body:
Dear Muhammet Atalay,
I can confirm that I would like B&B Information Technologies Services Ltd. to represent me solely in relation to vacancies at:
Dynamics C365 CRM Solution Architect - Role
I can confirm that I have not sent my CV to, or been in contact with any of these companies. I can also confirm that I have not given any other agency permission to represent me at any of these companies.
Regards, Mark Ozgur Twain
